def transform(sequence):
    nine_index = sequence.index('90')
    before_nine = sequence[:nine_index]
    after_nine = sequence[nine_index:]
    transformed_sequence = '0' * len(before_nine) + after_nine + before_nine.replace('0', '')
    return transformed_sequence

def transform(sequence):
    nine_index = sequence.index('90')
    before_nine = sequence[:nine_index]
    after_nine = sequence[nine_index:]
    transformed_sequence = '0' * len(before_nine) + after_nine + before_nine.replace('0', '')
    return transformed_sequence
